title: 01x9: Employee's Management of Nonprofit Organization
summary:
OGE discusses some of the ethics issues raised in connection with an employee's proposed involvement in the establishment and management of a nonprofit organization. 

Notes: [Notes: (1) The guidance in this Advisory regarding 18 U.S.C. § 205 was clarified in Legal Advisory LA-20-08. (2) Among other changes to the Standards of Conduct effective August 15, 2024, the restrictions on soliciting from prohibited sources described in .808(c)(1)(i) & (ii) do not apply if “circumstances make clear that the solicitation is motivated by a family relationship or personal friendship that would justify the solicitation.” See 89 FR 43686 and LA-24-06.]
